name: Office Defender (Aldo Gonzalez)
description:
Description

Have you ever been alone in your office, after a long day of work and suddenly an alien sneaks into it? This game is about simulating that experience in life that we all had. Only with a pistol and an AK-47. Kill the alien and show him who is boss!!!

How To Play

W A S D - Move

Space - Jump

Left Ctrl - Crouch

Left Click - Shoot

R - Reload

Scroll - Scroll through weapons

1 and 2 - Switch between weapons

Tip: The Windows version is better than the WebGL! Download link below!

Lore

The game is a conspiracy about an alien that sneaks into offices and eats employees. So stay home folks!!!
